title: Halle Bailey Gives Birth to Baby Boy Named Halo – Announcement Surprises Fans
text:
Halle Bailey became a mom. The American actress announced through her social networks that she recently gave birth to a boy, the result of her relationship with rapper Darryl Granberry Jr., popularly known as DDG.
The 23-year-old singer and songwriter also shared a
photo of her hand next to her baby’s, which he called Halo, on his Instagram account.
“Even though we are just a few days away from the new year, the best thing that 2023 could have done for me was bring me my son. Welcome to the
world my Halo, the world is desperate to meet you,” he wrote to accompany the publication.
The actress, known for the live action The Little Mermaid, did not specify the exact date on which her baby was born, it is only known that it was at the end of 2023.
After the announcement of the birth of Halo, Bailey’s publication obtained hundreds of likes and congratulatory comments from her followers and personalities such as Nicky Minaj, Kylie Jenner, Winnie Harlow and Halle Berry.
Discreet pregnancy
The
news that Halle Bailey became a mother took everyone by surprise because the actress carried her entire pregnancy in secretlike many aspects of his personal life.
Last year, a follower suggested that she looked like she was pregnant because a feature on her face, specifically her nose, had changed and she got angry. “My nose is what it is and I love it like that,” she answered, annoyed.
Rumors about the actress’ pregnancy reached their peak in September 2023when Bailey attended the MTV VMAs in a flowing orange dress that hid her belly.
The baby is the result of Halle Bailey’s discreet relationship with rapper DDGwith whom she has been in a relationship since March 2022.
After the birth of Halo, the rapper also spoke out about it and dedicated some of the most tender words to the baby. “You are the greatest blessing of my life. “I have never felt so in love before.”
Bailey’s best-known project is the live-action The Little Mermaid, which premiered in May of last year. Since it became known that the actress would play Princess Ariel, many were opposed; However, after the premiere of the Disney classic, critics and many fans applauded the actress’s work.
The actress’ most recent work was in the film The Color Purple, an adaptation of the literary classic Alice Walker, which premiered in December. In 1985, director Steven Spielberg then brought it to the big screen.
